word: H7947 - שָׁלַב - shâlab - shaw-lab' - Equally distant - சமமான தூரம்

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Equally distant / சமமான தூரம்
(Pual) to be bound, to be joined, to be joined together
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to space off; intensively (evenly) to make equidistant: - equally distant, set in order.
Cognate: H7947, H7948
